content:
NAME DESCRIPTION
ESTHESIS_EDGE_MODULES_DEDDIE_FETCH_TYPES_CAC_ENABLED--set esthesis.edge.modules.deddie.fetchTypes.cac.enabled Enables fetching Curve Energy Consumption (CAC) data.Default: true
ESTHESIS_EDGE_MODULES_DEDDIE_FETCH_TYPES_CAC_CATEGORY--set esthesis.edge.modules.deddie.fetchTypes.cac.category Category name when synchronising CAC data.Default: energy
ESTHESIS_EDGE_MODULES_DEDDIE_FETCH_TYPES_CAC_MEASUREMENT--set esthesis.edge.modules.deddie.fetchTypes.cac.measurement Measurement name when synchronising CAC data.Default: active
ESTHESIS_EDGE_MODULES_DEDDIE_FETCH_TYPES_CAC_ERRORS_THRESHOLD--set esthesis.edge.modules.deddie.fetchTypes.cac.errorsThreshold The number of errors after which CAC fetching is disabled for a device.Default: 10
ESTHESIS_EDGE_MODULES_DEDDIE_FETCH_TYPES_CRP_ENABLED--set esthesis.edge.modules.deddie.fetchTypes.crp.enabled Enables fetching Curve Reactive Power (CRP) data.Default: true
ESTHESIS_EDGE_MODULES_DEDDIE_FETCH_TYPES_CRP_CATEGORY--set esthesis.edge.modules.deddie.fetchTypes.crp.category Category name when synchronising CRP data.Default: energy
ESTHESIS_EDGE_MODULES_DEDDIE_FETCH_TYPES_CRP_MEASUREMENT--set esthesis.edge.modules.deddie.fetchTypes.crp.measurement Measurement name when synchronising CRP data.Default: reactive
ESTHESIS_EDGE_MODULES_DEDDIE_FETCH_TYPES_CRP_ERRORS_THRESHOLD--set esthesis.edge.modules.deddie.fetchTypes.crp.errorsThreshold The number of errors after which CRP fetching is disabled for a device.Default: 10
ESTHESIS_EDGE_MODULES_DEDDIE_FETCH_TYPES_CEP_ENABLED--set esthesis.edge.modules.deddie.fetchTypes.cep.enabled Enables fetching Curve Energy Produced (CEP) data.Default: true
ESTHESIS_EDGE_MODULES_DEDDIE_FETCH_TYPES_CEP_CATEGORY--set esthesis.edge.modules.deddie.fetchTypes.cep.category Category name when synchronising CEP data.Default: energy
ESTHESIS_EDGE_MODULES_DEDDIE_FETCH_TYPES_CEP_MEASUREMENT--set esthesis.edge.modules.deddie.fetchTypes.cep.measurement Measurement name when synchronising CEP data.Default: produced
ESTHESIS_EDGE_MODULES_DEDDIE_FETCH_TYPES_CEP_ERRORS_THRESHOLD--set esthesis.edge.modules.deddie.fetchTypes.cep.errorsThreshold The number of errors after which CEP fetching is disabled for a device.Default: 10
ESTHESIS_EDGE_MODULES_DEDDIE_FETCH_TYPES_CEI_ENABLED--set esthesis.edge.modules.deddie.fetchTypes.cei.enabled Enables fetching Curve Energy Injected (CEI) data.Default: true
ESTHESIS_EDGE_MODULES_DEDDIE_FETCH_TYPES_CEI_CATEGORY--set esthesis.edge.modules.deddie.fetchTypes.cei.category Category name when synchronising CEI data.Default: energy
ESTHESIS_EDGE_MODULES_DEDDIE_FETCH_TYPES_CEI_MEASUREMENT--set esthesis.edge.modules.deddie.fetchTypes.cei.measurement Measurement name when synchronising CEI data.Default: injected
ESTHESIS_EDGE_MODULES_DEDDIE_FETCH_TYPES_CEI_ERRORS_THRESHOLD--set esthesis.edge.modules.deddie.fetchTypes.cei.errorsThreshold The number of errors after which CEI fetching is disabled for a device.Default: 10
